description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Reach 3

+23 vs Reflex; 1d12+9 necrotic damage, and the target is pushed 1 square.

At-Will ✦ Illusion

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 5

+23 vs Will; and the dark initiate is invisible to the target until the start of the dark initiate's next turn. If the dark initiate uses this power against a new target, the previous target is no longer affected.

At-Will ✦ Fire, Necrotic

Standard

Area burst 1 within 10

+23 vs Reflex; 3d8+7 fire and necrotic damage.

At-Will ✦ Psychic

Standard

Close blast 5

+21 vs Will; 3d6+7 psychic damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Recharge 4-6

Standard

The dark initiate makes a black flame attack and a mind wrack attack.

Encounter ✦ Necrotic, Teleportation

Move, Encounter

Close burst 1

+23 vs Fortitude; 1d12+9 necrotic damage and the target is immobilized (save ends). The dark initiate teleports 10 squares, and can teleport creatures in the burst into a square the dark initiate occupied before teleporting.

Encounter ✦ Illusion

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When first bloodied

The dark master teleports 10 squares and becomes invisible until the end of its next turn.

At-Will ✦ Teleportation, Necrotic

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When damaged by an attack

The triggering attacker is teleported 3 squares and takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).
